bio: Seasoned Sr. Project Manager with 10+ years delivering complex digital projects for Microsoft, Morgan Stanley, Allergan, and government clients. Proven track record building PMO operations from scratch, managing distributed teams across 5 time zones, and delivering on-time, on-budget results.
differentiatorText: Active hands-on expertise in AI multi-agent systems, generative AI integration, RAG models, and production-ready AI application development.
